mapper.sql: id, goods_classify_id, name, description, img, origin_price, sell_price, discount, stock, limit_num, total_sales, status, create_user, create_time, update_user, last_update_time, deleted
mapper.select: select tg.id,goods_classify_id, (select tgc.name from tb_goods_classify tgc where tgc.id = tg.goods_classify_id) as classifyName, tg.name, description, img, origin_price, sell_price, discount, stock, limit_num, total_sales, status, tg.create_user, tg.create_time, tg.update_user, tg.last_update_time, tg.deleted from tb_goods tg where tg.deleted= 0

select tg.id,goods_classify_id, (select tgc.name from tb_goods_classify tgc where tgc.id = tg.goods_classify_id) as classifyName, tg.name, description, img, origin_price, sell_price, discount, stock, limit_num, total_sales, status, tg.create_user, tg.create_time, tg.update_user, tg.last_update_time, tg.deleted from tb_goods tg
WHERE CONCAT(tg.name,tg.description) LIKE CONCAT('%',#{keywords},'%')
and tg.deleted = 0
